field.name: MinSatellites
field.description: How many satellites are needed for safe operation. Default to 7

field.name: MaxPDOP
field.description: Maximal PDOP allowed for safe operation. Default to 3.5m

field.name: UbxAutoConfig
field.description: Ubx self configuration. Enable to allow the flight board to auto configure ubx GPS options, store does AutoConfig and save GPS settings (i.e. to prevent issues if gps is power cycled)

field.name: UbxRate
field.description: Ubx position update rate, -1 for auto. Default to 5

field.name: UbxDynamicModel
field.description: Ubx dynamic model, see UBX datasheet for more details. Default to 'Airborne1G'

field.name: UbxSBASMode
field.description: How SBAS sats are used. Default to 'Ranging'

field.name: UbxSBASChannelsUsed
field.description: Numbers of SBAS channels used. Default to 3

field.name: UbxGNSSMode
field.description: Ubx GNSS configuration, only applies to Ublox generation 7+ and concurrent GNSS only to generation 8
